agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM Thursday, February 28, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Pending business before the committee, as well as, the posted agenda for Thursday, February 28, 2019. The following nominees will appear: Court of Appeals for the Second Court of Appeals District Dana Michelle Womack Appointed 01-07-19 for a Nelson Tarrant County term to expire 12-31-20 Texas Water Development Board Brooke Teresa Paup Appointed 02-06-19 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 02-01-25 Board of Pardons and Paroles Allen D. Jernigan Appointed 02-07-19 for a Flores Val Verde County term to expire 02-01-25 Carmella T.
